description: Update product inventory levels. Accepts product_id or SKU, quantity adjustment, and operation type (set/add/subtract). Returns updated stock level and low stock alerts if applicable

product_id.description: UUID of the product to update (required if sku not provided)

sku.description: SKU of the product to update (required if product_id not provided)

operation.description: Operation type: 'set' to set exact quantity, 'add' to increase, 'subtract' to decrease (default: 'set')

low_stock_threshold.description: Optional: Update the low stock threshold for this product

sync_to_shopify.description: If true, attempt to sync inventory update to Shopify
